name: Ghost Cruiser
description:
Race time in a glowing cyber punk city, cruising through an environment bent on seeing you burn!

Developed by Cruising Studios (group 7) as our first project in The Game Assembly 2020!

Controls

A-D = Move Left or Right

Left or Right Arrow = Move Left or Right

Space = Jump

Left Shift = Speed Boost

F = Activate Pickup

Escape = Menu
